titles: Three decads of diuine meditations VVhereof each one containeth three parts. 1 A history. 2 An allegory. 3 A prayer. With a commendation of the priuate countrey life. By Alexander Rosse his Maiesties chaplaine in ordinarie.
author: Ross, Alexander, 1591-1654.
publisher: Printed by A[ugustine] M[athewes] for Francis Constable and are to be sold at the signe of the Crane in St. Paules Church-yeard,
notes: Printer's name and publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
